data.description:
Metro VR is First Person Shooter game.

The game is set in an abandoned subway station, where you fight against countless robots. Fight, hide and manage your weapons well! You have no time to lose.

changelog.change_log:
We've added compatibility with Gear VR. Now the app works on both Oculus Go and Gear VR.
Please check if everything is correct before replacing the app in the store, as we are already selling app for Oculus Go goggles.

1. We deleted additional titles on Store Cover Art. Now in store cover art we have only game title.
2. We solved VRC.Mobile.Functional.1 bugs.

We changed:


VRC.Mobile.Asset.2

Store cover art images must have a clear logo without extraneous text, taglines, or banners.


VRC.Mobile.Input.3

When the user presses the back button, the app must either go back one level in your UI or display a menu with an option to quit the app.
Pressing the Back button doesn't go back one level in the menu UI hierarchy, nor does it display a menu with an option to quit the app.

t
Overview
Result
Compatibility Tests

Oculus Go


This app includes x86 libraries. These are unnecessary and take up space. The following x86 libraries should be removed: libunity.so, libmonobdwgc-2.0.so, libmain.so, libMonoPosixHelper.so. In the future, this will cause the app to be rejected.






Test
Overview
Result
Correctness Test

Oculus Go


The package does not implement the entitlement check. Please follow the instructions in the Oculus Developer Documentation at https://developer.oculus.com/documentation/platform/latest/concepts/pgsg-unity-gsg/
